page.title: 13RECREATION IN BASSINGBOURN
page.content: {CHILDREN SOCIAL (PARENTS) SPORTS BROWNIES 15 W.I 4 BOWLS 7 CUBS 39 B.LEGION 1 CRICKET 10 RED CROSS 16 Y.F.C 3 SOCCER 10 YOUTHCLUB 33 SAVE/CHN 3 BADMINTON 7 YTH SOCCER 8 DRAMA 1 TENNIS 14 KEEP FIT 6 { TOTAL 111 12 54 {55% 3% 13% This diagram shows only a small number of the clubs available to parents and children. There are evening classes at the college also. The F.O.B (Friends of Bassingbourn) is the organization behind most of the adult activities. The primary school has a busy P.T.A. This table shows where everyone likes to swim:{HOME INFANTS COLLEGE ROYSTON 10 47 85 44 {LETCHW'TH BUNTINGF'D STEVENAGE CAMB'GE 98 39 22 29
